input.sentences: but we soon had to continue or journey down the narrow road .
finally we reached the village where we had to ring the large bell to be let in .
the villager sent a boy to meet us at the entrance and lead us inside .
we were then brought to the path that lead to the sacred park .
output.sentences: Walking down the foggy road was an ethereal experience.
We approached the village at last
We met our guide among the brightly colored buildings
As we continued down the road, it was a spiritual experience.
